armorstatues.dataSync.finished: Finished sending queued armor stand data
armorstatues.screen.vanillaTweaks.checkT: Highlights the closest armor stand within three blocks of the player which will be adjusted. Due to how data packs work, this isn't necessarily the armor stand which opened this menu.
armorstatues.screen.vanillaTweaks.lock.d: Locking an armor stand prevents it from being changed using this menu and disables interaction with the equipment slots.
armorstatues.screen.vanillaTweaks.swapMa: Swaps items between the main hand and helmet equipment slots.
Swaps items between the main hand and off hand equipment slots.
armorstatues.screen.vanillaTweaks.toolRa: Align an armor stand with a tripwire hook on the wall above it so that a tool held by it appears to be hanging up. Also locks the armor stand and disables all slots except the mainhand.
armorstatues.screen.vanillaTweaks.unlock: Unlocking an armor stand reverts any adjustments made via a previous lock action.
item.minecraft.armor_stand.description: Use [%s] + [%s] with an empty hand to open configuration screen.
statues.screen.alignments.block.descript: Align an armor stand placed on a surface so that a block held by it appears on the surface.
statues.screen.alignments.itemFlat.descr: Align an armor stand placed on a surface so that a non-tool item held by it appears flat on the surface.
statues.screen.alignments.itemFloating.d: Align an armor stand placed on a surface so that an item held by it appears upright on the surface.
statues.screen.alignments.tool.descripti: Align an armor stand placed on a surface so that a tool held by it appears flat on the surface.
statues.screen.centered.description: Align an armor stand in the center of the block position it is placed on.
statues.screen.cornered.description: Align an armor stand at the corner of the block position it is placed on.
statues.screen.credits: Some content on this page originates from the Vanilla Tweaks "Armor Statues" data pack. Click this button to go to their website!
statues.screen.rotations.pose.head: 头部
statues.screen.rotations.tip1: 长按 [§dShift§r] 键移动 Y 轴，长按 [§dAlt§r] 键移动 X 轴
statues.screen.rotations.tip2: Use arrow keys to move sliders with greater precision than when dragging! Focus a slider first by clicking.
statues.screen.style.name: 设置盔甲架的名称
statues.screen.style.noBasePlate.descrip: 隐藏盔甲架底部的底座
statues.screen.style.sealed.description: 盔甲架无法被破坏，装备无法更换。生存模式下无法启用该选项
statues.screen.style.showName.descriptio: 在盔甲架头顶上显示名称
